SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface ClientSkeleton

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, ClientGUI, ClientTUI
public interface ClientSkeleton extends Remote
The ClientSkeleton interface represents the remote interface for the client in the game controller. It defines the methods that can be called by the server to communicate with the client.

    • updateChat

      void updateChat(ChatMessage message) throws RemoteException
      Updates the chat with a new message.
      Parameters:
      message - the chat message to be updated
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
